job.title: Sr Manufacturing SDE
job.description: <ul><li>Solid (5+ years) of programming experience using C#. 3+ years of development experience on the .NET platform and Windows Services</li><li>Hardware Software integration</li><li>Prior experience working in a Manufacturing or Test Engineering environments</li><li>Excellent Communication skills.
